quest.name: So You Want to Be a Weaver

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Greetings, adventurer, and welcome to the wellspring of Ul'dahn fashion.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: From humble thread, our peerless artisans weave wonders─dreams in fabric form.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: We are renowned as Eorzea's finest purveyors of quality textiles, and as her foremost arbiters of style.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Needless to say, such renown was not won without effort. Ours is a tremendously demanding profession, you see...but also a highly rewarding one. It is little wonder that so many adventurers have set their hearts upon joining us. Might you be one of them?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Join the Weavers' Guild?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Oh. What a pity.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Well, should you be seized by an urgent need to weave, I will be happy to assist you.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Excellent! Then allow me to─ Wait...am I right in thinking that you...?

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Oh dear, I fear we may be getting a little ahead of ourselves. Now that I look at you, you don't seem quite as...well traveled as I thought.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Please try to understand─we feel that those who would pursue the creative arts require a measure of worldly experience. I suggest you learn more of your current trade before trying your hand at ours.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Before you can take up another discipline, you must first complete the level 10 quest of your starting class.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Ah! I thought as much! Then I'm sure you're eager to learn all about our illustrious history.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: As I'm sure you know, Thanalan can be a perilous place, its vast deserts being wont to punish the unprepared. While a menagerie of ferocious beasts stalk the sands, the greatest foe is, of course, the midday sun.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: And so, ever since man first set foot in this region, he has favored light, flowing fabrics that shield him from the sun's rays while allowing his skin to breathe.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Of course, Ul'dahns have ever been a people of taste, and demand for more extravagant designs spurred innovation, resulting in textile goods whose appeal extended far beyond our borders.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Merchants had little trouble selling Ul'dahn fabrics in foreign markets, so great was their reputation for beauty and quality.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: And when traders from those same markets sought to peddle their lesser products in Thanalan...

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Well...it gave us little cause for concern.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Sunsilk Tapestries is synonymous with the textile trade in Ul'dah, you see. Those who come here hoping to peddle cheap rags swiftly learn the price of doing business in our territory.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Wiser men and women with an interest in our trade choose instead to join the guild, which the company generously operates for the betterment of Ul'dahn society.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: We offer our members the tools and techniques needed to become successful. And should they prove themselves especially skilled, they may even be offered direct employment as Sunsilk weavers!

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Just imagine, adventurer─your designs could one day dictate the course of Ul'dahn fashion!

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: If you desire such fame and influence, then you might be granted a place with us...

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: Provided that you are willing to embrace hard work.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: To ensure candidates can endure the rigors of our profession, our guildmaster has taken it upon himself to evaluate each one personally.

dialogue.name: MARONNE
dialogue.text: When you are ready to submit yourself to his rigorous scrutiny, say the word.
